string.value: Now that the Teleport Device has been turned on, time to find some Crystanol!
You found a Crystanol Fragment! Now it's time to return to the Time Machine. But before you do that, you should give #b#p9250130##k some detailed information about the Energy Laboratory.
Now, use the Time Machine to return to the present and deliver the Crystanol Fragment to Doctor Bing.
(You study the Crystanol carefully.)\r\n#L0##bSo this is what Crystanol looks like! It's bigger than I thought. #l\n#k
(You move closer to the Crystanol.)\r\n#L0##bIt seems chipped in places... I guess that makes sense if Doctor Bing is sending others here, too. I'll just grab a piece.#l\n#k
(You attempt to break off a #b-Crystanol Fragment-#k.)\r\n#L0##bThis thing...isn't budging! Argh!#l\n#k

(You rip off a #b-Crystanol Fragment-#k.)\r\n#L0##bWhew! Now I better get back to the Time Machine. I should probably also tell #p9250130# how to get in the Energy Laboratory. Too bad these fragments are so heavy or I'd grab an extra for #p9250130#.#l\n#k
(You place the #b-Crystanol Fragment-#k inside your bag.)
(A bright light is glowing from the Crystanol.)
Back already? Ooooh! Is that a Crystanol Fragment!!\r\n#L0##bI wanted to bring back a piece for you, #p9250130#, but it was too heavy. I'm sorry.#l\n#k
Aww, I wish you could've, but that's okay. \r\n#L0##bThe Energy Laboratory was exactly where you said it'd be, but it was protected by lasers.#l\n#k
Oh no! Then how'd you get past?\r\n#L0##bI did some tinkering around. You shouldn't have any problems getting past.#l\n#k
Whew, that's a relief! I'll head over in a little bit. Just let me rest for a few more minutes...\r\n\r\n
Make it back safely to our own time. I'll follow soon, with my own Crystanol Fragment! (I hope...)
